personalDetails.aboutMe: Technology enthusiast with a strong foundation in React and TypeScript, passionate about collaborating within diverse teams to achieve shared goals. Currently expanding my skill set with Python and Tailwind, I thrive on the challenge of continuous learning. With a down-to-earth and iterative approach to problem-solving, I'm committed to delivering practical solutions that make a difference.
personalDetails.other: Outside of work, I am passionate about my hobbies and often engage in multiple projects simultaneously. In spring and summer, I relish fishing on lakesides. As colder seasons set in, I indulge in playing board games; recently, I've been running a Dungeons & Dragons campaign with colleagues at Smart. Additionally, you can find me rock-climbing whenever I get the chance, and occasionally, I've been known to strum the guitar.

Built proof-of-concept features for user testing and implemented feedback-driven changes.

Resolved production bugs and refactored inefficient code in Smart's legacy systems.
Enhanced testing coverage and feature set for clients across various domains.
Acquired knowledge of pension law in diverse jurisdictions and customised features for users in UK, EU, and Middle East.
Developed customised solutions using JavaScript, TypeScript, React, Vue, Angular, and other technologies as required.
Created proof-of-concept examples for Sales Team to onboard potential customers and assisted new customer onboarding.
Identified and documented bugs, contributed to the company knowledge base, and developed showcase projects for the company blog.
Assisted in developing and maintaining a custom CRM system using PHP, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and MySQL.
Collaborated iteratively with end-users to incorporate features tailored to their needs.
